dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use this tool to generate the 3D City Information Model (3DCIM) database schema or parts of it.

tool.name: SchemaGenerator

param.name: generate_classes
param.expression: {SpatialVolumeAnnotation | SpatialPointAnnotation | SpatialAreaAnnotation | SpatialLineAnnotation | Building | BuildingEntrancePoint | BuildingShell | BuildingShellPart | BuildingInteriorSpace | BuildingFloor | BuildingInteriorStructure | InteriorInstallation | SupportingStructure | Fence | StreetFurniture | Sensor | SensorCoverage | Sign | Tree | ZoningDistrict | AdministrativeDistrict | Parcel | LandCover | TransportNetworkSegment}

param.name: generate_relationships
param.expression: {BuildingHasEntrance | BuildingHasShell | BuildingHasShellPart | BuildingHasSpace | BuildingHasFloor | FloorHasSpace | FloorHasStructure | SensorHasCoverage | SpaceHasInstallation | ZoneHasRegulation | ZoneHasUsage | SpaceHasUsage | ParcelHasRegulation | ParcelHasNeigborhood | ParcelHasUsage}

param.name: generate_domains
param.expression: {AccessType | AnnotationType | Boolean | BuildingInteriorSpaceType | BuildingInteriorStructureType | BuildingRoofForm | BuildingUsage | BuildingType | ConstructionStatus | InteriorInstallationType | LandCoverType | ParcelType | PlanType | SensorType | ShellPartType | StreetFurnitureType | TreeCanopyShape | TreeGenusType | TreeSpeciesType | ZoningUsageType | CityFabricRelationType | FlowDirection | RegulationOperator | RegulationAspect | RegulationType | TransectType | RegulationBlockType | RegulationFootprintType | RegulationFootprintAlignmentType | Unit | VerticalExtentType | DirectionType | PavementType | TransportSegmentType | SegmentNameDirection | SegmentNameGeneric | AdministrativeDistrictType | NutsCode}

tool.summary: Use this tool to generate the 3D City Information Model (3DCIM) database schema or parts of it.
tool.usage: Create an empty File Geodatabase, run this tool, select the new File Geodatabase and fill in the parameters.
